alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Garland; Hot Spring; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Garland, southeastern Scott, southwestern Yell, northern Montgomery and western Hot Spring Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1013 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Oden, or 16 miles northwest of Mount Ida, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Oden... Meyers... Mauldin... Gibbs... Pencil Bluff... Bonnerdale... Crystal Springs Landing... Royal... Silver... Sims... Crystal Springs... Story... Hurricane Grove... Washita... Pearcy... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central, western and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Central and Southern Scott County; Garland; Hot Spring; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations; Yell Excluding Northwest
